title: Grisaia no Meikyuu + BD Special (BDrip Uncensored) [v2]
description:
Grisaia no Meikyuu + Special (BDrip Uncensored) [v2]

in English:
The Labyrinth of Grisaia

Episode name: the cocoon of caprice 0

(the "The Cocoon of Caprice I" episode is the first episode of the sequel series "Grisaia no Rakuen", please note that crunchyroll and horriblesubs name this episode 14... go figure!!!)

Special Episode name: ???

Credits: Chihiro

the aspect ratio of "Grisaia no Meikyuu" is 2:35:1 like the original aspect ratio in the retail BD's
and that was the ratio on the previous season BD's as well (Grisaia no Kajitsu)

the "special" episodes that came with the BD's of these
series ("Grisaia no Kajitsu","Grisaia no Meikyuu" and "Grisaia no Rakuen")
have a aspect ratio of 16:9 although they never aired on TV...

P.S. :
don't forget to watch the scene after the credits!!!!!

Notice:
this is version 2 since in my previous torrent the song subtitles during the end credits of the main episode were a bit off screen... that of course didn't spoil anything...but still... i thought i should fix it... :-)

Series Viewing Order 

1 - Grisaia no Kajitsu (The Fruit of Grisaia):
13 Episodes + 6 Specials



2 - Grisaia no Meikyuu (The Labyrinth of Grisaia):
Just 1 Episode + 1 Special



3 - Grisaia no Rakuen (The Eden of Grisaia):
